title: “We will adopt your baby”
brief_description: This week the US Supreme Court’s overturned the landmark ruling Roe v. Wade. Social media is awash with protests, political speeches, resource sharing - and memes. ‘We will adopt your baby’ is a phrase with its genesis in pro-life counter-protest signs. It has quickly become a meme deriding the offensive and unreasonable response of Christian conservatives who promote adoption as a “solution” to the dismantling of life-saving reproductive rights. Tiktok users like @tacobelldollamenu use cynical humour to reveal the lie of this rhetoric: if adoption is the solution, why does the US have a crisis in the foster system? Where are all these pro-lifers’ happily adopted kids?
description:
This video features in a responsive display in the museum that presents the moments, stories and memes capturing the zeitgeist by going viral on the internet.

This week the US Supreme Court overturned the landmark Roe v Wade ruling . Social media is awash with protests, political speeches, resource sharing – and memes. ‘We will adopt your baby’ is a phrase that started as a slogan on pro-life counter-protest signs. It’s quickly become a meme deriding the offensive and unreasonable response of Christian conservatives who promote adoption as a “solution” to the dismantling of life-saving reproductive rights.

Tiktok users like @tacobelldollamenu use cynical humour to reveal the lie of this rhetoric: if adoption is the solution, why does the US have a crisis in the foster system? Where are all these pro-lifers’ happily adopted kids?
